info.description:
Ruya is a Python-based breadth-first, level-, delayed, event-based-crawler for 
crawling English, Japanese websites. It is targeted solely towards developers 
who want crawling functionality in their projects using API, and crawl control.

You can view the online documentation at http://ruya.sourceforge.net/
info.keywords: web crawler, web spider, web robot
info.name: Ruya
info.html_description:
